title: 1-2 WEEKS OFF SELECT UNITS- MONTROSE
posting_body: For leasing info call or text
Montrose Apartments Near The Museum District.
These Apartments in Montrose offers a unique location both just minutes from Downtown Houston and a short walk to some of the finest art and history Houston has to offer.
At our Montrose apartments, you'll discover some of Houston's most unique and eclectic fine art you'll find only in Montrose.
Enjoy being just steps away from the Montrose HEB, one of Houston's most iconic gourmet grocery stores.
Art, dining, museums and unique shopping, including the Menil Collection and Hermann Park, are just steps from your front door.
Relax By Our Heated Resort Style Pool
Poolside Outdoor Kitchens With Gas Grills
Entertain With Friends At Our Outdoor Fire Pit
Resident Club Room For Parties and Events
